trait.name: Resistant
text: The roachling skirmisher has advantage on Constitution saving throws.

trait.name: Unlovely
text: The skirmisher has disadvantage on Performance and Persuasion checks in interactions with nonroachlings.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The roachling lord makes two melee attacks or throws two darts.

action.name: Begrimed Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

action.name: Begrimed Dart
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
